description: Miwa, also known by the nickname Mogii, is a girl in Fumi`s class for their first year with a gentle personality and wear her hair in a shoulder-length wavy style. She is a member of the drama club with Misako and Youko. She is the only one of her friends to be put into a separate class in their second year. Miwa becomes interested in Akira`s brother Shinobu and the two start dating around the end of her first year of high school.
name: Motegi Miwa
